name: 黃有評
objective:
機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
The goal of probability is to develop the ability for undergraduate students to construct and analyze probabilistic models in a manner that combines intuitive understanding and mathematical precision.
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction to probabilty models
Week 2~3. Basic concepts of probability theory
Week 4~5. Discrete random variables
Week 6~7. One random variable
Week 8. Mid-term exam.
Week 9~11. Pairs and vector random variables
Week 12~13. Statistics
Week 14~15. Random processes
Week 16~17. Markov chains
Week 18. Final exam.
materials:
textbook:
Alberto Leon-Garcia, Probability, Statistics, and Random Processes for Electrical Engineering,  3rd Ed.. Pearson Education International, 全華圖書代理
reference:
J.S. Milton, J.C. Arnold and K.I. Liu, Probability and Statistics for Engineering and the Computing Sciences, McGraw Hill, 東華書局代理
